name: research-os
description: Bundled plugins with shared context for research including vision planning, experiment planning and spec- and test-driven implementation workflows.

plugins.name: researcher
plugins.description: Comprehensive Research agents specializing in synthesising hypothesis and claims, researching related work, challenging assumptions, implementing code and planning experiments.

plugins.name: engineer
plugins.description: Comprehensive Software engineering agents specializing in professional spec- and test-driven development of artifacts.

plugins.name: presenter
plugins.description: Scientific presentation agents and skills specializing in professional, insightful and engaging research presentations.

plugins.name: MPI-cluster
plugins.description: HTCondor job submission skill for MPI clusters. Simplifies resource specification and job submission using condor_submit_bid.

author.name: Attila Juhos & Robin Ruff & Claude Code
